instructions: Insert a new white rectangle: `fill('#FFFFFF'); rect(0, 246, 174, 19);`
Change the grey rectangle's position and size: `fill('#A6A6A6'); rect(0, 265, 174, 118);`

Change the bottom white stripe's position and height: `fill('#FFFFFF'); rect(0, 369, 174, 16);` Also change the canvas height in `setup()` to `createCanvas(261, 385);` - we'll trim off the extra canvas later
Change the black rectangle height: `fill('#000000'); rect(174, 279, 87, 90);`
